title: More than words
creator_credit: Marvin Dreyer, Henry Strauss and Henry Strauss Productions
brief_description: Describes some simple techniques for good communication, to the end that people may know where they stand with one another. Illustrates how failure to give clear instructions can cause misunderstandings, trouble and dissatisfaction to those receiving the instructions.
